text: The Belgium national under-19 football team represents Belgium in youth international football. They have attended the FIFA U-20 World Cup once in 1997 and the UEFA European Under-19 Football Championship four times. ==Competitive Record== ===FIFA U-20 World Cup Record=== Year Round GP W D* L GS
